overview: As vice-president of business development, Chris brings over 14 years of experience in the areas of business development, marketing, and product management. Chris has held a variety of executive and director positions at Microsoft, Axonwave Software, NCompass Labs (acquired by Microsoft in 2001), and Fulcrum Technologies (acquired by Hummingbird in 1998). While at NCompass Labs, he was responsible for positioning the company’s content management product as a leader in its class. At Microsoft, Chris was responsible for worldwide product management and product marketing of Microsoft’s Content Management Server.
